message.entry: The control region must be either 2, 3, or 4 OFDM symbols for number of resource blocks less than or equal to 10 (i.e. for a channel bandwidth of 1.4 MHz).
The control region must be either 1, 2, or 3 OFDM symbols for number of resource blocks greater than 10 (i.e. for a channel bandwidth greater than 1.4 MHz).
The specified codebook index must be 1 or 2 for a two transmit antenna configuration.
The specified codebook index must be in range [0, 15] for a four transmit antenna configuration.
